intro.title: Fun and simple
intro.desc: A simple <0>RPG</0> style game on discord that is constantly <0>evolving</0>. All the <0>base mechanics</0> you expect and more.

features.title: Features
features.desc: Dbot is packed with <0>functionalities</0>. You can <0>hunt a monster</0> to have a chance to get his <0>loot</0> or even fight the strongests in a <0>PVP battle</0>.

equipments.title: Equipments
equipments.desc: Equipments can be obtained in the slot machine, dropped from monster, bought in the marketplace or even crafted.

pve.title: PVE
pve.desc: Hunt down monsters with other players to have a chance to gain their loots and more.

pvp.title: PVP
pvp.desc: Fight a combat to death with your weapon and your spells versus another player to gain currencies and fame.

quests.title: Quests
quests.desc: Embark on different quests when you have some free time to gain some useful resources to craft items.

enchantments.title: Enchantments
enchantments.desc: Trade some enchant gems to have the ability to enchant your items to boost their statistics.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.desc: Each action in your adventure can give you some achievement and sometime some titles.
